mapper.select: select passbyRtID from routemap where stRtID = #{stRtID} and endRtID = #{endRtID}
select crewName from crew where crewID = #{stRtID}
select crewName from crew where rtID = #{rtID}
select rtID from crew where crewID = #{crewID}
select rtTime,rtLength from route where rtID = #{rtID}
select * from emergencyplan where planName like concat(concat("%",#{planName}),"%")
select * from material where matName like concat(concat("%",#{matName}),"%")
select * from watersource where watSrName like concat(concat("%",#{watSrName}),"%")
select * from crew where crewName like concat(concat("%",#{crewName}),"%")
select pointID,pointX,pointY,sptOrdInRt from location where zmLev = 1 and sptOrdInRt = #{srcID} and ptType = 2
select pointID,pointX,pointY,sptOrdInRt from location where zmLev = 1 and sptOrdInRt = #{srcID} and ptType = 3
select pointID,pointX,pointY,sptOrdInRt from location where zmLev = 1 and sptOrdInRt = #{srcID} and ptType = 4
select pointX,pointY from location where rtID = #{rtID} and zmLev = #{zmLev} and ptType = 1 and sptOrdInRt = 1
mapper.update: update emergencyplan set planName = #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planIntro = #{planIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetRtID = #{targetRtID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, routes = #{routes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, materials = #{materials,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, watersource = #{watersource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crew = #{crew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrTime = #{arrTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rtsLen = #{rtsLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wdFrcRst = #{wdFrcRst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tempRst = #{tempRst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timeRst= #{timeRst,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where planID = #{planID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update material set matName = #{matName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ffSuit = #{ffSuit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GpsDevice = #{gpsDevice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transCar = #{transCar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dynamotor = #{dynamotor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, waterPipe = #{waterPipe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rtID = #{rtID,jdbcType=INTEGER} where matID = #{matID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update crew set crewName = #{crewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headCount = #{headCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, crewType = #{crewType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leader = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rtID = #{rtID,jdbcType=INTEGER} where crewID = #{crewID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
